title: ULTIMATE GAME MUSIC MEGAPACK - VOL. 1
description: The Ultimate MUSIC MEGA PACK for all your game music needs with over 8 hours of audio delights!
longDescription:
The total Volume 1 Collection contains 12 full packs plus a folder of bonus extras; with a combined total cost of $295 / £215 this MegaPack is most excellent value!. Containing more than 8 hours of music and over 400 audio files covering many genres to service your game soundtrack needs. Watch the trailer for a quick overview of the contents HERE and check out examples of all music packs HERE.


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 Collection by Ethan Lewis Maltby is a varied selection of game music packs covering many styles and genres. With plenty of epic scale as well as some intimate beauty, the pack contains themes, variations, stems, loops and some sound FX.


The MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 Collection - Contains the following packs:


BATTLES - Perfect for anything with a Historical Battle feel, a mixture of heavy, violent and tense, to foreboding, reflective and tragic. Mostly suitable for period set games of any genre as long as there are swords, and maybe, dragons. From the heat of battle, to the aftermath, the foreboding tension to the tragedy of loss, this pack covers all this and more... DETAILS HERE


HALLOWEEN HORROR - Perfect for anything with a Horror/Halloween feel, a mixture of dark and serious themes and lighter more Burton-esque Halloween playfulness. With harpsichord and pipe organ prevalent through many tracks, this pack is perfect for anything with a Gothic Horror vibe. DETAILS HERE


PUZZLES - Perfect for anything light and fun from puzzles to farming or nature-based games . An eclectic pack of lively, fun and colourful tracks written for any project with a light and fluffy feel. Includes full tracks perfect for menus and in-game action plus short stings for Success and Failure. DETAILS HERE


SPACE EXPLORATION - Perfect for anything requiring a space exploration feel, a mixture of both upbeat and gentle tracks suitable for many uses. Featuring spacious synths and gentle orchestral tones, this pack is perfect for anything from mellow scenes to full space exploration. DETAILS HERE


CHRISTMAS - Perfect for anything with a Christmas feel, a mixture of light and magical wintry themes, with some stings and stems to help your adaptive approach. With sleigh bells and choirs prevalent through many tracks, this pack is a great accompaniment for anything with a Christmas or winter vibe, for elf-like mischief to sitting by the fire. DETAILS HERE


ASIA - Perfect for anything requiring a Far East feel, a mixture of both upbeat and gentle tracks suitable for many uses. Featuring authentic instruments from the East, plenty of Taiko drums, Koto and Shakuhachi, this pack is perfect for anything from mellow scenes to full Samurai warfare. DETAILS HERE


DREAMS: MEDITATION - Perfect for anything with a mellow feel; a mixture of soft, light and relaxing tracks, smooth and sweet with nothing to give you nightmares. Suitable for games of any genre with an atmosphere of relaxation and warmth. Melodic, lush and glacially-paced this pack offers some meditative and minimal arrangements of gentle synths and shimmering strings. DETAILS HERE


CELTIC - Perfect for anything with a Celtic feel, a mixture of light and mellow, atmospheric themes, fun jigs and epic highlands. With bagpipes and whistles prevalent through many tracks, this pack is perfect for anything with a Scottish, Irish or Druid-y vibe and in places, appropriate for some epic action or heart-melting romance. DETAILS HERE


ACTION - Perfect for anything requiring an Action feel, a mixture of percussive, epic and driving themes. With heavy percussion, guitars and electronics prevalent through many tracks, this pack is perfect for anything from spies to modern warfare, from stealthy to assault. DETAILS HERE


FAIRYTALES - Perfect for anything with a Fairytale vibe, a mixture of light, fairy feels, enchantment and journeying music. Mostly gentle with a touch of magic throughout. A magical pack of light orchestral and colourful tracks written for any project looking for some enchantment. DETAILS HERE


FUTURE/SCI-FI - A pack of 42 tracks of Futuristic/Sci-fi audio perfect for anything futuristic from puzzles to shooters. A largely electronic pack of tracks written for any project with a futuristic feel. DETAILS HERE


HEROES - Perfect for anything requiring a Heroic feel, a combination of both orchestra and modern synths suitable for many uses and styles. Each theme is loopable, there are variations of some and stems of others plus a selection of uppers and downers. DETAILS HERE
technicalDetails:
Features:

-8 Hours of FULLY MASTERED audio ready for import

- A total of more than 500 Tracks for total flexibility

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre.


Number of Audio Wavs: 558

Number of Audio Cues: 558

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: (Yes, much of it)

Minutes of audio provided: 8 + Hours

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Additional Notes:

Please do let me know if you use my work on any of your games so I can share and promote.

For any questions, enquiries or if you are interested in collaborations or commissions, please feel free to contact me and for more information about my work, please visit my website.
